content: this is a summary of a legal case involving a dispute over coowned property between two parties the case has gone through multiple stages including a cost procedure and a compensation decision the court of appeal has dismissed an appeal and upheld the judgment of the first instance court the case revolves around the division of ownership of a real estate property with the plaintiff owning 60 and the defendant owning 40 the court has considered the contributions and responsibilities of each party in determining the ownership shares the case also involves the application of certain laws such as the marriage family relations act and the civil procedure act the court of appeal has reviewed the evidence and arguments presented by both parties and has found that the judgment of the first instance court was correct the costs of the appeal proceedings have been determined according to the civil procedure act overall this summary provides an overview of the progress and outcome of the legal case without disclosing the specific parties involved

metadata.CASE_ID: Sodba Višjega sodišča v Ljubljani I Cp 499/2021, 15. 9. 2021
